content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -81.5)
Contains coal and serves as a storage unit for resources.

### Burner Mining Drill at position (42.0, -83.0)
Extracts coal from the ground. 
- Currently working with an inventory of 9 coal.

### Burner Inserter at position (42.5, -80.5)
Transfers items from one entity to another. 
- Currently has no fuel.

### Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -81.5)
Transfers items from one entity to another. 
- Currently waiting for space in the destination with 1 coal in inventory.

### Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Processes raw materials into finished products.
- Currently has no ingredients.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters without fuel
- Ensure that inserters have fuel before attempting to use them. Check the fuel status and replenish as necessary.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for space in destination
- Make sure that the destination entity has enough space to receive items before inserting. Monitor the inventory levels of the destination entities.

### Errors when extracting from a chest without checking inventory
- Always check the inventory of the source entity (e.g., Wooden Chest) to ensure there are enough items to extract before performing the extraction.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check the status of nearby entities to avoid conflicts.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the current execution steps.

### Important Variables
- `coal`: int (total amount of coal in various inventories)
- `burner-mining-drill-status`: EntityStatus (status of the burner mining drill)
- `burner-inserter-status`: EntityStatus (status of the burner inserters)
- `stone-furnace-status`: EntityStatus (status of the stone furnace)
